thread.title: London mayor hammers poor school kid
thread.title_full: London mayor hammers poor school kid

title: London mayor hammers poor school kid
text:
Boris Johnson whacks an unfortunate child during friendly rugby game Tyson Otto news.com.au Boris Johnson whacks an unfortunate child during friendly rugby game Tyson Otto news.com.au London Mayor takes out 10-year-old school kid 0:44 
Rugby: The Mayor of London Boris Johnson has shown better skills than the English Rugby World Cup side, taking out a 10-year-old schoolboy during a mini rugby game in Tokyo. October 16th 2015 /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/Rugby Union/News/ 
THIS is one way to seal a trade deal. 
Overzealous London mayor Boris Johnson has made international headlines for a sensational barnstorming hit-up during a game of rugby. 
The only problem is the 51-year-old public figure was playing against 10-year-old Japanese children in a friendly game of touch football. 
Johnson was celebrating the conclusion of a four-day trade visit to Japan by playing a game with students from Nihonbashi, Yaesu & Kyobashi Community Associations in Tokyo. 
With the Brave Blossomâ€™s winning plenty of international admiration for their shock Rugby World Cup win over South Africa, rugby appears to be quite trendy in Japan right now. 
So, with the game underway, Johnson stepped up to the plate and grabbed the football for the standard photo opportunity for media covering his visit. Other Stories
